metadata.synopsis: One-liner for gazzete wanderer who roams around Blushing Mermaid

1.speaker: Wrint Sprigley
1.text: The Blushing Mermaid is an adrift shipwreck in more ways than one. For starters -
1.context: NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

0.speaker: Wrint Sprigley
0.text: Excuse me, I must return to my work. The Baldur's Mouth Tavern Review doesn't write itself.

3.speaker: Wrint Sprigley
3.text: Oh my word! It's you - from the front page! Could you spare a few words for my article?

7.speaker: Wrint Sprigley
7.text: No - that'd take too long. I'll just paraphrase. The hero of Baldur's Gate looked in disgust at the tavern...
7.context: NodeContext: correcting self, italics are you composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out loud

4.speaker: Wrint Sprigley
4.text: Incessantly interrupting street wanderers ruin the atmosphere outside the Blushing Mermaid...
4.context: NodeContext: he's composing an article in his head, this is pointedly turned againt the player in annoyance

6.speaker: Wrint Sprigley
6.text: Could you not have been more considerate in your misdemeanours?

5.speaker: Wrint Sprigley
5.text: Some of us have tavern reviews to publish, and your crimes have taken up all the column space.

8.speaker: Wrint Sprigley
8.text: The Blushing Mermaid is also frequented by the criminal scum haunting this very gazette's hallowed pages.
8.context: NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

9.speaker: Wrint Sprigley
9.text: It is a shame Lord Gortash passed before his Steel Watch could condemn this wretched tavern, this absolute hive -
9.context: NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

10.speaker: Wrint Sprigley
10.text: It seems, dear readers, that this spot is often frequented by a hero of Baldur's Gate...
10.context: NodeContext: composing a future newspaper article (almost like they're dictating) out lourd

11.speaker: Wrint Sprigley
11.text: This reporter found himself distracted by both Lord Gortash's tragic death and unbearably talkative street vagrants outside the Blushing Mermaid...
11.context: NodeContext: he's composing an article in his head, this is pointedly turned againt the player in annoyance
